Title: A Warm Harvest
Description:
Everyone knows heat plays a critical role in blacksmithing.

I hear the Emerald Dream is still heavily under attack by allies of the flame. There must be a way to harvest fuel from those eternally fiery creatures.

If you do secure anything, I'm sure one of the local blacksmiths in the Dream will be very interested.
ObjectivesText: Collect 10 Essence of Endless Flame in the Emerald Dream.

Objectives.Text: Complete the events of "Enter the Dream"
